snippet.title: Superola Champion Edition - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Superola Champion Edition is a challenging runner-style platforming adventure, in which you’ll have to guide a burger loving llama in its quest to defeat the Hotdog Aliens and recover the stolen hamburgers... before they get cold!

Explore 10 worlds with over 70 super challenging stages, unlock all the costumes and map’s secrets, fight boss battles, clear bonus rounds and compete with up to 4 friends!

Features:

- Over 70 stages with tons of secrets and costumes to unlock
- Choose between 4K cartoon graphics or retro pixel art
- Super challenging platforming, leaderboards & achievements
- 4 Player split-screen VS (Remote play compatible)
- Bonus Alpaca's Redemption game included
- Remastered and chiptune original soundtracks


Available now on all platforms:
🎮#PS4 | #PS5
➡️https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10004829

💻#Steam
➡️https://store.steampowered.com/app/572510?utm_source=youtube

🕹️#NintendoSwitch: 
➡️https://www.nintendo.com/en-us/store/products/superola-champion-edition-switch/

🎮#Xbox
➡️https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/superola-champion-edition/9ppprhcgbqbf?cid=msft_web_chart


More information in our web:
http://www.jandusoft.com/superolachampionedition
